source.content: every project with empathy humility and passionate collaboration Everyone is all in “They made what we formerly perceived as a complicated and daunting task easy and enjoyable and the end result was beyond our imagination” “Hey come to our barbeque on Saturday” And “We had a great time with you helping to build that community garden” We want to create work that benefits humanity whether that’s on-screen or off So whenever possible we take our talents outside of our traditional work and get our hands dirty helping where we can Every year we identify a cause or causes and commit ourselves to making a difference for them We don’t chase trends We build the best possible experiences for people using the best technology available at the time Designers and stakeholders have the best intentions at heart But users ultimately determine the success of a product We involve real users to validate and direct our approaches Yes it’s weird but true civilization existed before the Internet Point being

We respect the people we work with from employees to contractors to clients and partners Work is a subset of these humans’ lives By doing work that matters in a way that engages and delivering exciting results we expect the people we work with to be enthusiastic about working with us We haven’t been let down yet We look for opportunity to improve other lives in our community Locally regionally nationally and internationally we strive to be humanitarians in the truest sense of the word and dedicate a portion of our hands minds and revenues to humanitarian initiatives We work with companies and organizations that understand that humans will use their tools and makes those humans the primary drivers of their products We adore our clients To have such affection we make sure we're on the same page as our partners both on a project and personal level We welcome clients into our agency and encourage participation in our outreach effortsHere are some examples of our great partnerships in

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: In the passage, there are mentions of several environmental impact metrics related to flooding, including "where floods will occur," "what the severity of the flood might be," and "what they should do to stay safe and keep property protected." These metrics provide valuable information about the potential effects of flooding on various aspects of the environment, such as water quality, habitat destruction, and greenhouse gas emissions. Additionally, by understanding the location and severity of floods, communities can better prepare for and respond to these events, minimizing their overall environmental impact.

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result:
Based on the provided information, there are several products, services, and technologies mentioned. Some key examples include:

1. Web-based applications that are responsive to all device types.
2. Digital tools and applications designed to improve the lives of humans using them.
3. Technologies that enable remote work and communication across distributed teams.
4. Agile methodologies for efficient project management.
5. Virtual presence tools for conducting conversations, meetings, reviews, and sharing.
6. Mobile apps and platforms that provide educational resources and career development opportunities in the advanced manufacturing industry.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employment or educational opportunities are currently available?
Employment & Opportunities.result: There are several employment and educational opportunities available through various platforms. For example, the PetroChemWorkscom website offers resources for individuals seeking careers in the petrochemical industry. Additionally, TNWorkLearnEarncom provides information on education and training programs in advanced manufacturing for residents of Tennessee. Furthermore, the CHAMP project focuses on increasing the number of skilled workers in the advanced manufacturing sector by offering degree and certificate programs aligned with industry needs. Lastly, the Trade Adjustment Assistance Community College and Career Training TAACCCT grant supports initiatives aimed at connecting students and career seekers with relevant education and training opportunities in their local regions.

source.content: heart But users ultimately determine the success of a product We involve real users to validate and direct our approaches Yes it’s weird but true civilization existed before the Internet Point being we've seen the pitfalls and successes We've learned a lot and we’re really good at applying all those lessons to every project we execute We love to see the enthusiasm and wide-eyed wonderment that comes when people adopt and adapt to new technologies Ok so we’re not claiming to be fortune tellers but with decades of experience we’ve learned enough to know that when making new products they need to be successful now and for many years to come So we always have one eye on what’s ahead While we carefully tend to the future our current toolbox leans heavily towards web-based applications particularly those that are responsive to all device types We love what’s going on right now with phones and tablets and the whole internet of things Our distributed team isn't limited to who’s available in a

every project with empathy humility and passionate collaboration Everyone is all in “They made what we formerly perceived as a complicated and daunting task easy and enjoyable and the end result was beyond our imagination” “Hey come to our barbeque on Saturday” And “We had a great time with you helping to build that community garden” We want to create work that benefits humanity whether that’s on-screen or off So whenever possible we take our talents outside of our traditional work and get our hands dirty helping where we can Every year we identify a cause or causes and commit ourselves to making a difference for them We don’t chase trends We build the best possible experiences for people using the best technology available at the time Designers and stakeholders have the best intentions at heart But users ultimately determine the success of a product We involve real users to validate and direct our approaches Yes it’s weird but true civilization existed before the Internet Point being

business that McDonald’s does”—Lisa SchumacherDirector Education Strategies Flooding in Florida is a way of life but it does not have to be life-threatening Super Humane and DHI partnered to create a Web App designed to keep citizens and business owners alerted to current and upcoming floods CHALLENGEKeep citizens aware of potential floods and how they affect the places they interact with on a daily basis SOLUTIONProvide a real-time and localized alerting system to help citizens and the business community understand where floods will occur what the severity of the flood might be and what they should do to stay safe and keep property protected The app will help keep the City of Miami Beach safe as well as save money due to property loss and damage Flooding in Florida is a way of life but it does not have to be life-threatening Super Humane and DHI partnered to create a Web App designed to keep citizens and business owners alerted to current and upcoming floods CHALLENGEKeep citizens

Research & Innovation.question: What research grants or innovation awards have been recently distributed?
Research & Innovation.result: It seems like there were multiple research grants and innovation awards distributed recently. One notable example is the Trade Adjustment Assistance Community College and Career Training TAACCCT grant which was awarded by the US Department of Labor to the Colorado Helps Advanced Manufacturing Program (CHAMP). This grant aimed to increase the attainment of degrees and certifications in manufacturing in order to better serve employers' needs. Additionally, it appears that the Council for Adult and Experiential Learning (CAEL) has received funding from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, along with other partners such as Complete Tennessee and Tennessee Labor and Workforce Development. Through this collaboration, CAEL developed a web application called "TNWorkLearnEarn" which serves as an interactive job and industry matching tool for students and job seekers in Tennessee.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What organizations, institutions, or entities is the organization collaborating with?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Based on the provided information, the organization appears to be collaborating with various organizations, institutions, and entities across different industries and regions. Some notable mentions include:

1. Association for Talent Development (ATD) - Serves talent development professionals to help them reach their full potential through improved knowledge, skills, and abilities in the workplace.
2. International clients and partners - Collaborates with clients and partners from around the globe, catering to diverse industries and sectors.
3. Distributed team - Works with talented individuals from various locations, ensuring access to top-tier expertise regardless of geographical constraints.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: Are there any joint events, projects, or initiatives? If yes then list them.
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: Based on the provided information, I cannot find any specific mention of joint events, projects, or initiatives between the mentioned entities. However, they do express appreciation for their partnerships and collaborations. They also emphasize their shared values and goals, which suggest that they may participately in various activities together.

every project with empathy humility and passionate collaboration Everyone is all in “They made what we formerly perceived as a complicated and daunting task easy and enjoyable and the end result was beyond our imagination” “Hey come to our barbeque on Saturday” And “We had a great time with you helping to build that community garden” We want to create work that benefits humanity whether that’s on-screen or off So whenever possible we take our talents outside of our traditional work and get our hands dirty helping where we can Every year we identify a cause or causes and commit ourselves to making a difference for them We don’t chase trends We build the best possible experiences for people using the best technology available at the time Designers and stakeholders have the best intentions at heart But users ultimately determine the success of a product We involve real users to validate and direct our approaches Yes it’s weird but true civilization existed before the Internet Point being

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: In these collaborations, there are several shared objectives and desired outcomes. Firstly, both parties aim to produce meaningful work that positively impacts individuals and communities. This includes creating digital tools and applications that enhance human experiences and improve lives. Additionally, they strive to foster strong relationships built on trust, understanding, and open communication. Collaborators also seek to learn from one another, exchanging knowledge and expertise to drive innovative solutions. Finally, both parties hope to achieve successful projects and lasting partnerships, resulting in mutually beneficial outcomes and continued collaboration in the future.
